sentences.en: " Thomas Sawyer, this is the most astounding confession I have ever listened to.
sentences.cn: “ 托马斯-索亚, 这可是我听到的最叫人吃惊的坦白交待了.

sentences.en: Astounding! It must be a mistake.
sentences.cn: 奇怪! 一定是搞错啦.

sentences.en: Everywhere was tumult, exultation , deafening and maniacal bewilderment , astounding noise , yet furious dumb - show.
sentences.cn: 到处是骚动 、 兴奋 、 令人耳聋的疯狂的混乱,令人震惊的呼喊, 却也有激怒的哑剧场面.

sentences.en: Highly developed control systems could guide these rockets with astounding accurancy.
sentences.cn: 高度发展的控制系统能够以极高的精确度制导这些火箭.

sentences.en: Raw materials had been extracted in astounding volumes.
sentences.cn: 原材料被耗用的数量使人震惊.

sentences.en: She knitted an astounding purple scarf.
sentences.cn: 她织了一条叫人大吃一惊的紫色围巾.

sentences.en: Sondra brooded on the astounding climax.
sentences.cn: 桑德拉正默默地想着这个使人震惊的打击.

sentences.en: That anything novel ever surmounts these hurdles to evolve is astounding.
sentences.cn: 任何能够跨越种种障碍以求进化的新颖事物都令人惊骇.

sentences.en: The concert was an astounding success.
The figures revealed by the report are astounding.
sentences.cn: 这份报告透露的数字使人震惊.

sentences.en: The vegetation surrounding this historic place is equally astounding.
sentences.cn: 这处历史遗迹周围的植被也同样震撼人心.

sentences.en: There was an astounding 20% increase in sales.
This boy was well dressed, too -- well dressed on a week - day. This was simply astounding.
sentences.cn: 而且这个男孩穿得非常讲究 —— 在平常工作日竟穿戴如此整齐, 仅这就让汤姆对他刮目相看.

sentences.en: This is the most astounding confession I have ever listened to.
sentences.cn: 我从来没听到过谁坦白出这样的事情.

words.tran_cn: 令人吃惊的,令人迷惑的

trans.tran_en: so surprising that it is almost impossible to believe

trans.tran_cn: 使震惊，使大吃一惊astound的现在分词)
